meanings: ('주다'의 높임말) give[offer] (sb sth / sth to sb)

vlive.korean: 드리죠! I will give it to you! 듣기 View video V Beauty : 개강맞이 여신 메이크업 / Become a goddess at begin school
vlive.english: I will give it to you!

vlive.korean: 찍어드릴게요 어떻게 찍어드리죠? I'll take it for you! How should I take it? 듣기 View video Hwang Chi Yeul : 강원 산불돕기 행사를 마치고^^
vlive.english: I'll take it for you! How should I take it?

vlive.korean: 오늘 잘 부탁드립니다! - 뭘 부탁드리죠? Please take care of us. - Take care of what? 듣기 View video KIM JAEHWAN(김재환) : [🎬] 째니타임즈⏰ EP.17 부산 원아시아페스티벌 비하인드
vlive.english: Please take care of us. - Take care of what?

vlive.korean: 저희 한번 걸어볼까요? - 소개를 좀 해드리죠 자 여기는... Shall we take a walk? - I will introduce this place... This place... 듣기 View video N.Flying : 우리 얘기 좀 합시다 #19
vlive.english: Shall we take a walk? - I will introduce this place... This place...

vlive.korean: 너무 감사드리죠. I'm very thankful. 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#160. 윙 가르디움 라비오우사 (w. 라비 of 빅스)

examples.korean: Let me put it more straightforwardly. 발음듣기 좀 더 솔직하게 말씀드리죠. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Let me put it more straightforwardly. 발음

examples.korean: I’ll say this much for him—he never leaves a piece of work unfinished. 발음듣기 그 사람에 대해서는 이 정도만 말씀 드리죠. 그는 일을 안 끝내고 놔두는 법이 없어요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’ll say this much for him—he never leaves a piece of work unfinished. 발음

examples.korean: Let me put you in the first tier of the balcony. 발음듣기 발코니 좌석의 첫 번째 줄로 해 드리죠. Neungyule
examples.english: Let me put you in the first tier of the balcony. 발음

examples.korean: Let me be your banker. 발음듣기 내가 돈을 융통해 드리죠. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Let me be your banker. 발음

examples.korean: If the book were in the library, it should be at your service. 발음듣기 그 책이 도서관에 있다면 마음대로 볼 수 있게 해 드리죠. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If the book were in the library, it should be at your service. 발음
